attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If any e-petition achieves 100,000 signatures, this should automatically trigger a national referendum on the issue (this could be done electronically to reduce costs).  The result of the referendum to be binding on the government to introduce legislation on the issue within 3 months.  Failure to do so will automatically result in a general election within 3 months.
In a so-called democracy, it is unacceptable that a government can wilfully ignore the will of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
